ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(ISBLANK(Technical_Contact_Name__c),
isCreatedByVlocity__c = FALSE,
(OR(RecordTypeId = '012E0000000kLoz', RecordTypeId = '012E0000000kLoc', RecordTypeId = '012E0000000kLod', RecordTypeId = '012E0000000kLog')),
(OR(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) > DATEVALUE("2017-10-11"), ISNEW())) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill in the Technical Contact Name field
